info.description:
Access to AIS MQTT Bridge requires authorization in AIS.

 ###### ![AIS logo](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_mqtt_bridge/ais_mqtt_bridge.png?v=8) 

 Click the **SUBMIT** below to start the authorization process
info.title: Authentication in AI-Speaker.

 Fill in the form below and click **SUBMIT** button.

abort.single_instance_allowed:
You already have the integration to AIS MQTT BRIDGE set up.

 If you want to reconfigure, remove the current integration first.
